abstract: Stocks manage small gains after drifting.
lead_paragraph: Investors took Greek elections, which put an anti-austerity party into power, in stride, and stocks eked out tiny gains on news of several large corporate mergers.
snippet: Investors took Greek elections, which put an anti-austerity party into power, in stride, and stocks eked out tiny gains on news of several large corporate mergers.

headline.main: A Sluggish Morning for the Market Gives Way to a Mostly Tepid Day
headline.print_headline: A Sluggish Morning for the Market Gives Way to a Mostly Tepid Day
